title: E3 Saxo Classic: Mathieu van der Poel Crushes Solo Cobblestone Victory after Wout van Aert Crash
content:
Van der Poel rampages to first road win of 2024 at the 'Mini Tour of Flanders' with 43km solo escape.

Read the full article at E3 Saxo Classic: Mathieu van der Poel Crushes Solo Cobblestone Victory after Wout van Aert Crash on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
